text:
Hi, I’m Youssef El Desoky — a front-end and mobile developer who’s passionate about building modern, responsive, and user-friendly applications. I work with technologies like Flutter, React, React Native, and Dart to create seamless experiences across platforms.

This portfolio showcases my approach to clean architecture, performance optimization, and intuitive UI design. Whether it's mobile apps or web interfaces, I aim to write clean code and deliver thoughtful solutions.

Feel free to explore my projects, and don’t hesitate to reach out
